Familiar, Thrush

Presented here are the base animal statistics for all of the most commonly used familiars-of course, these statistics can also be used for normal animals as well. Small animals like these use Dexterity to modify Climb and Swim checks.



Thrush

CR 1/3

XP 135
N Diminutive animal
Init +2; Senses low-light vision; Perception +5
DEFENSE
AC 16, touch 16, flat-footed 14 (+2 Dex, +4 size)
hp 2 (1d8-2)
Fort +0, Ref +4, Will +2
OFFENSE
Spd 10 ft., fly 40 ft. (average)
Melee bite -1 (1d2-5)
Space 1 ft.; Reach 0 ft.
STATISTICS
Str 1, Dex 15, Con 6, Int 2, Wis 15, Cha 6
Base Atk +0; CMB -2; CMD 3
Feats Skill Focus (Perception)
Skills Fly +12, Perception +5
ECOLOGY
Environment temperate forests
Organization solitary, pair, or flock (3-12)
Treasure none


Thrushes are small, plump birds that eat fruit and insects. All thrushes are known for their beautiful songs, but thrush familiars are also capable of actual speech.
AbilitiyScores: Str 1, Dex 15, Con 6, Int 2, Wis 15, Cha 6
Name: Thrush
